questions.quote: I think you absolutely have to say something to this guy. Confront him.

If there's any doubt, I do a leave-behind. Keys, gloves, scarf -- I go back to her place to pick it up... date number two.

Why did we invite him? Stupid, stupid. when he asked for a ticket, I should have said no. I'm gonna go chew him out.
I went to podiatry school because I like feet. I chose to work with feet.
